Method Detail

update

protected void update(double x)
Update moving average for a sequence of values x1, x2, ..., xi 
    si = (1 - a) * si-1 + a * xi
    wi = (1 - a) * wi-1 + a
    
    s0 = 0
    w0 = 0
    
    For i > 0: avgi = si / wi





Specified by:
update in class Average






Parameters:
x - the value
See Also:
Average.update(double)

Specified by:

Returns:
the average

phantomGet

public double phantomGet(double y)
Moving average for a sequence of values x1, x2, ... assuming a hypothetical value y as the last element of sequence. 
    s = (1 - a) * si + a * y
    w = (1 - a) * wi + a
    
        avg = s / w
    
    si = (1 - a) * si-1 + a * xi
    wi = (1 - a) * wi-1 + a
    
    s0 = 0
    w0 = 0





Specified by:
phantomGet in class Average






Parameters:
y - hypothetical last value of sequence.

Returns:
average assuming last value of sequence is y
See Also:
update(double), 
Average.phantomGet(double)
